entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.2°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 99 %

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 except northeast 80 gusting to 100 through mainland inlets and valleys this morning. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 60 gusting to 80 through mainland inlets and valleys this evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Drizzle or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Drizzle changing to rain near noon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
